STEP_ONE.TITLE: What is your email address?
STEP_ONE.FIRST_LINE: We use your e-mail address to keep track of what has been ordered. Please enter your e-mail address in the box below.
STEP_ONE.SECOND_LINE: If you would prefer to remain anonymous, please create a new address instead and use that.

STEP_TWO.TITLE: Where do you want to send items to ?
STEP_TWO.FIRST_LINE: We currently have volunteers ready to receive items in the following countries. Select a country that you can pay for items in to continue.
STEP_TWO.SECOND_LINE: Select the country you wish to send items to, and click/tap continue.

STEP_THREE.TITLE: What do you want to donate?
STEP_THREE.FIRST_LINE: We have two categories of products you can donate. What would you like to donate?
STEP_THREE.MED_EQUIPMENT_LABEL: I want to donate medical equipment
STEP_THREE.OTHER_EQUIPMENT_LABEL: I want to donate other equipment

STEP_FOUR.TITLE: What do you want to donate?
STEP_FOUR.FIRST_LINE: These items are required for frontline troops. Select one of the items below. Those in red are high priority items. Note the price is approximate.

STEP_FIVE.TITLE: Add to your basket(s)
STEP_FIVE.FIRST_LINE: We have the following links for {{product}} that delivers to {{country}}. Please specify how many of the items you have put to the shopping basket.

STEP_SIX.TITLE: Would you like to donate more?
STEP_SIX.FIRST_LINE: Would you like to register more items? If yes, you can select more
STEP_SIX.BACK_BUTTON: Yes, I want to donate more.

STEP_SEVEN.TITLE: Complete your order
STEP_SEVEN.FIRST_LINE: You can now complete your order(s) on the chosen websites. Please send them to the address listed.
STEP_SEVEN.SECOND_LINE: Once you have completed your purchases, please confirm that by uploading order screenshots. Be sure to avoid any personal information.

STEP_EIGHT.TITLE: Thank you
STEP_EIGHT.FIRST_LINE: We have recorded your order in our inventory. We really appreciate your support. Thank you for supporting Ukraine.
STEP_EIGHT.SECOND_LINE: If you want to order another item, click order another item. Otherwise, you can now close this tab.
